nodes.text: A holopad was a handheld device used to project holograms. It required a display disk to project the holograms. There have been many uses of holopads beginning from the days of the Galactic Republic.

Meetra Surik owned multiple datapads during her exploration of the galaxy, some for reading previously entered logs by other individuals, others for passwords and bypassing security measures, and even a few for historical data.
